name: The Egg
description:
You always wanted to be an egg or maybe you just want to know how an egg lives? Then you can now with "The Egg".
You can either live alone, with friends or with other eggs in a nest and enjoy the landscape to the fullest and maybe something will happen in the end ..... Or maybe not? Find out!

To keep things from getting too monotonous for you as an egg, you collect levels that grant you access to new skins or accessories and over time you unlock new maps, as long as you wait for these changes, you can just enjoy the environment as a simple egg and wait ... and wait ..... and wait.

Tip: The game has a maximum level, but this does not mean anything and the bird egg might show a reaction sooner than expected

Note
On the whole, this is an idle game. There are a few extras planned for the Early Access, so that you don't just lie around as an egg.



- Unlock new maps over time
- Play with up to 32 players
- Unlock skins and accessories for your egg with each level
- Explore the map with the camera or hop around as an egg.
- Real time day night cycle



- Food
- Clothes
- Weapons
- and more



- Hexagon
- Lava
- Carbon
- Camouflage
- Plain
- and more
